== Parappur (CT) (627550) ==

Parappur (CT) is a town in the [[Tirurangadi]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 15.11 sq. km. and harbouring 6554 households with total population of 36270 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 15 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 400 km. Male population is 16975 and female population is 19295. Scheduled Caste population is 612 and Scheduled Tribes population is 56. Census Location Code of the town is 627550<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 15 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 45 km. Railway station is at Tirur at a distance of 16 km.
